website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few niggling design flaws, the 3250 is a great multimedia smart phone with a truly unique design.
pros: The Nokia 3250 has a stylish yet functional twisting design that rotates up to 270 degrees
We also liked its large display and external music controls
Features include a 2-megapixel camera, a video recorder, a music player, a Micro SD card slot, a speakerphone, and Bluetooth
cons: The Nokia 3250's navigation joystick isn't easily accessible when the phone is swiveled into camera mode, making it difficult to browse through the camera's options
The Micro SD card slot is located in a tiny inconvenient spot

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks fantastic (impressive)!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to get it “dialed in”. Lots of pressure here at the house. We necked down just after the water meter (coming into the house). Now that it is dialed in I’ve been impressed. Hafta be careful with the sprayer...It’ll take off skin! Well not quite but it is easily more than enough to clean anything that needs it. The washers are a bit wonky. Upgrade to some nice washers and enjoy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: john t thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose faucet!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a modular home. The faucet was small and useless in the utility sink. Finding a 4 inch spread is not easy so when I came across this adjustable faucet I was ecstatic! It has definitely exceeded our expectations and has saved lots of time whether you are rinsing a mop or bathing a dog!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet if you can tighten it fully.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars, because I love it, but it wont tighten up so it kind of moves side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get what I order.
customer_reviews.text: Good faucet but what made me give it 2 stars was it’s not what I order. I ordered the single hole and it came with the two hole wall month. I had to use what ever I can use just to get the restaurant going. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kanyarat Promlam

customer_reviews.title: Junk...
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Didn't last 3 months before it started leaking....
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Great price for such a key item for industrial cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: What a great addition to our industrial sink. Made work and clean up a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Dereck Connors

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer type faucet!
customer_reviews.text: I've been through 2 other sprayer type faucets. Neither as heavy duty as this one.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Contractor who put it in wanted to know where I bought it. Amazon of course. Uses less water, I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Twekesbury

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Faucet
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the faucet looked good but it came as a completely different faucet. It came as a wall mount and not as a deck mount that I ordered. The handles were knobs instead of levers and the bucket filler was a different length. I think the wrong part number was put on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Don't miss your return date under any circumstance.
customer_reviews.text: Company was responding and has stopped. I had asked to exchange and they said yes - but then they stopped responding.
customer_reviews.author: bloorg27

customer_reviews.title: Good value nice all in one unit
customer_reviews.text: Directions are not good had Plumber install .that's his comment. I say nice solid unit shipped in great shipping box .worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: mark allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent quality and we got it for less than half the price that we pay From our local suppliers. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Item is poorly made. The sprayer head is very cheap and sprays water all over. Item was replaced but the same problem happened
customer_reviews.author: Lior R.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The inside piece of the sprayer scracked after only 2 months of use making the sprayer just dribble water out and not spray. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Kevo F
